advancements.advanced_notes: Group winners advanced directly to Round of 16
advancements.wild_card_notes: Group runners-up advanced to Knockout Round play-offs
advancements.transferred_notes: Third-placed teams transferred to Europa Conference League

matches.walkover_notes: Walkover: RB Leipzig won on walkover as UEFA suspended Spartak Moscow due to the Russian invasion of Ukraine.
matches.disqualified_notes: Spartak Moscow was disqualified due to the Russian invasion of Ukraine.
